No puedo mover el mouse k wea help
litterally better than the main half life story

I love the pacing, the game has an enjoyable good length but the pacing it up too, i never found myself bored of filler like levels and the such. The story, as always, is extremely entertaining. One problem is the occasional glitch but once you put on raw mouse input the game becomes easily a great play.

Great expansion to the original. This game not only brings in newer experiences but also explains and completes the original. Although it seems there wont be any follow up on this story its still worth playing if you want to know more about the Half Life story and more about Black Mesa itself.

The idea of completing the same experience from a different perspective while not having to face the exact same scenarios makes this game really exciting. The addition of newer weapons and enemies and also the exploration of the undiscovered parts of Black Mesa shows the reality of this organisation's nature.

Half-Life: Opposing Force is a great DLC for Half-Life. It has new everything. New story, new character, new areas, and new weapons. Well, it was new 23 years ago, and was new for me for the past week. Overall I think I enjoyed my time with this as much as the main game. Unlike the main game however, I did not experience any major bugs in this DLC. But, I won't hold that against the main game, because I don't know if it was a problem with my device, steam, or the game itself. I know if your'e reading this you've likely played the main game, but in case you haven't, do play the main game first. I do recommend this DLC to those who want more H-L1.
Dale Valve, un pixel de Shephard por la re chucha
Just a basic continuation of Half-Life with a new character.  Nothing much has changed, and it doesn't add much to the basic version except that it's a new challenge.  Still had fun though.  5/10.

I was shown this by the same friend who showed me Half-Life itself back in early 2000, he was into the series and so was I from here on. Got it and played it straight after the first game so felt like one big continuous experience. Loved every second of it, more of the same but from another perspective and got to view some of what had already been seen from another point of view. Shorter than Half-Life but in my opinion slightly better in terms of detail, a trend which continues with the next expansion also. As with Half-Life itself could not recommend more, first time players might find it dated now but enjoy it for what it was and for me still is.

I may favor OP4 a bit more than the base game. It just felt so good to exterminate race X creatures with new weapons in a decent new locations as a badass marine. This is how expansion packs should be.
The campaign is fun but the multiplayer is where it's at. Multiplayer is fun as hell as long as you find the right friends.

The game is a classic shooter. The game is amazing. The game has a compelling story and is fast paced shooter. If you love that kind of game you should buy. It is an amazing way to get into the half life franchise.

Un add-on (ce que les mill√©nials connaissent sous le nom de DLC) de Half-Life, assez plaisant, certes nettement moins long que le titre l√©gendaire, mais tr√®s agr√©able puisqu'il vous permettra de d√©couvrir ce qui se passe √† Black Mesa du point de vue d'un jeune soldat.
Dur√©e pour finir le jeu : entre 5 et 8h, selon comment vous vous d√©brouillez. Hors speedrun, cela va de soi. Ceux qui vous diront l'avoir fini en 2h vous mentiront ou bien auront exploit√© des failles (les c√©l√®bres "bug-exploit" ou exploitation de failles) qui ne sont pas sens√©es l'√™tre.
Le truc dingue, c'est que ce jeu a + de 20 ans et marche encore, m√™me sur une machine r√©cente avec Windows10, alors que XP n'existait m√™me pas quand ce jeu est sorti ! Quand on sait que des jeux de 10-15 ans ne fonctionnent m√™me plus...

This feels like it could have been the original half life release, it is that good. Everything fits in so well, the new guns feel very fitting for the world, and the new enemies do as well. Only real complaint is that health packs are fairly sparse, but otherwise it is an phenomenal game. I highly recommend this
